protocol.text: Affy-GUI, normalized by GCRMA. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 GCRMA
Plants were germinated and grown on plates containing Murashige and Skoog salts, pH 5.7, 1% sucrose (w/v), and 0.5% phytogel (w/v) in continuous light at 22 degrees C.

Trichomes were removed with forceps from the fifth and sixth rosette leaves of three-week-old wild-type and gtl1-1 mutant plants according to a previously established protocol (Jakoby et al, 2008). Total RNA was extracted from three biological replicates by a Qiagen plant RNeasy kit, and treated with DNaseI (Takara Bio, Japan) following the manufacturer's instructions.
RNA probes were labeled using an Affymetrix 3' IVT Express Kit (Affymetrix, Japan)
Hybridized onto Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome GeneChips(r) (Affymetrix Inc., USA) according to manifucture's instruction (Affymetrix).
GeneChips are scanned in a GeneChip Scanner 3000 (Affymetrix Inc., USA) and CEL files are generated from DAT files using GeneChip(r) Operating Software (GCOS) software (Affymetrix Inc., USA).
